mentalWellness.title: [da] Mental Wellness
mentalWellness.description: [da] Learn about understanding your feelings, developing healthy coping strategies, and supporting others. Nurture your mind for a balanced life.
mentalWellness.skillAreaUnderstandingEmotionsDescriptio: [da] Learn to identify and understand your feelings and the feelings of others.
mentalWellness.skillAreaCopingStrategiesDescription: [da] Discover healthy ways to manage stress, anxiety, and difficult emotions.
mentalWellness.skillAreaMindfulnessBasicsDescription: [da] Practice techniques to stay present and calm your mind.
mentalWellness.skillAreaBuildingResilienceDescription: [da] Develop skills to bounce back from challenges and adversity.
mentalWellness.skillAreaEmpathyAndSupportDescription: [da] Learn how to support others and build strong, healthy relationships.

languageLab.title: [da] Language Lab
languageLab.description: [da] Embark on a journey to learn new languages! Interactive lessons, vocabulary building, and grammar practice for languages around the world.
languageLab.skillAreaExploreDescription: [da] Choose a new language to learn or continue your progress.

languageLabView.noLessonLoaded: [da] No lesson loaded. Please select a lesson.
